name: Mastercam Learning Edition Model
summary: An EMCAM file is a 3D model created by CNC Software Mastercam Learning Edition, the free trial of Mastercam computer-aided design ( CAD ) software. It contains one or more objects with their 3D coordinates, levels, planes, and other information. Machinists often create and edit mechanical parts with Mastercam Learning Edition to produce physical copies of the part.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: EMCAM file open in CNC Software Mastercam Learning Edition 2023
